散瞳薬: (さんどうやく) - mydriatic agent; mydriatic drug
散茶: (さんちゃ) - powdered tea; freshly-brewed, aromatic tea

散華: (さんげ) - falling as flowers do; dying a glorious death
散蒔く: (ばらまく) - to disseminate; to scatter; to broadcast; to give money freely; to strew

散見: (さんけん) - being seen here and there

散逸: (さんいつ) - being scattered and ultimately lost; dissipation

散開星団: (さんかいせいだん) - open cluster
散骨: (さんこつ) - scattering of ashes (cremated remains)
散骨希望: (さんこつきぼう) - the wish to have one's ashes scattered

敦朴: (とんぼく) - honest and homely; simple
敦樸: (とんぼく) - honest and homely; simple
敦煌: (とんこう) - sincerity and kindheartedness; honesty and simplicity

敦睦: (とんぼく) - cordial and friendly; affectionate
敬い: (うやまい) - reverence; respect; honor; honour; veneration; esteem
敬う: (うやまう) - to show respect; to honour; to honor
敬具: (けいぐ) - (letters ending with this start with 拝啓) Yours sincerely; Yours truly; Sincerely yours
敬呈: (けいてい) - salutation in a formal letter
敬啓: (けいけい) - salutation at the end of a formal letter
敬天愛人: (けいてんあいじん) - (yoji) "Revere heaven, love people." (favorite motto of Saigo Takamori, 1827-1877)
敬意をはらう: (けいいをはらう) - to pay respect (to)
敬意を払う: (けいいをはらう) - to pay respect (to)
敬白: (けいひゃく) - (letters ending with this start with 謹啓) Yours Sincerely
敬称: (けいしょう) - title of honour; title of honor
敬称略: (けいしょうりゃく) - titles omitted; (names listed) without honorifics

敬老の日: (けいろうのひ) - Respect-for-the-Aged Day Holiday (third Monday in September)

敬老金: (けいろうきん) - cash gift from local government to the elderly (often on 77th and 88th birthdays)
敬語: (けいご) - honorific; term of respect; polite expression; honorific language

敬遠: (keien) - fingir respeitar alguém enquanto, na verdade, se mantém distante, mantendo a pessoa à distância, dando um largo espaço; evitando (algo desagradável), esquivando-se de

数あれど: (かずあれど) - although there are many of them
数え: (かぞえ) - old manner of reckoning one's age, newborns being considered a year old, with everyone adding one year to their age at New Year's
数えなおす: (かぞえなおす) - to count again
数える: (かぞえる) - to count; to enumerate
数え上げる: (かぞえあげる) - to count up; to enumerate

数え役満: (かぞえやくまん) - {mahj}  yakuman from having at least 13 han
数え方: (かぞえかた) - counting system; way (manner) of counting
数え歌: (かぞえうた) - counting song; enumerative form (of waka)
数え直す: (かぞえなおす) - to count again
数え立てる: (かぞえたてる) - to enumerate; to count up
数え違える: (かぞえちがえる) - to miscount; to count wrongly (e.g. pages)
数か国: (すうかこく) - various countries; several countries
数か所: (すうかしょ) - various places; several sources
数に入れる: (かずにいれる) - to count; to include in the number
